bike.description: FACT 11m carbon front triangle, 29" geometry, FACT IS construction, gussetless TT S/M, FACT carbon seatstays w/carbon non-drive DO and chainstays, tapered HT, carbon PF-30 BB, 142mm drop-outs, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 100mm
